Class.name: BlazorPager
Class.summary: Pagination component for Blazor and Razor Components application.

Property.name: TagName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the HTML tag name for the container element of the pager, default value is div.

Property.name: CurrentPageIndex
Property.summary: Gets the current page index.

Property.name: InitPageIndex
Property.summary: Gets or sets the current page index value when the pager component initialized first time.

Property.name: PageSize
Property.summary: Gets or sets the number of data items that are displayed for each page of data.

Property.name: TotalItemCount
Property.summary: Gets or sets the total number of data items that are available for paging.

Property.name: TotalPageCount
Property.summary: Gets the total number of pages that are available for paging.

Property.name: NumericPagerItemCount
Property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of the numeric pager items to be displayed.

Property.name: ShowPrevNext
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the previous page and the next page pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: ShowFirstLast
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first page and the last page pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: ShowNumericPagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the numeric pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: ShowMorePagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the more pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: PrevPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous page pager item.

Property.name: NextPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next page pager item.

Property.name: FirstPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the first page button.

Property.name: LastPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the last page pager item.

Property.name: MorePageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the more pager items.

Property.name: AutoHide
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether MvcPager should be hidden if there's only one page of data.

Property.name: PagerItemCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to every pager items.

Property.name: CurrentPagerItemCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the current page pager item.

Property.name: NumericPagerItemCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the numeric pager items.

Property.name: DisabledPagerItemCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the disabled navigation pager items.

Property.name: NavigationPagerItemCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the first, previous, next and last page pager items.

Property.name: MorePagerItemCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the more pager items.

Property.name: NumericPagerItemTextFormatString
Property.summary: Gets or sets the format string for all numeric pager items.

Property.name: CurrentPagerItemTextFormatString
Property.summary: Gets or sets the format string for the current page number.

Property.name: RoutePattern
Property.summary: Gets or sets the route template that the pager component used to generate pagination links, it must contains a "{0}" placeholder.

Property.name: OnPageChanged
Property.summary: Gets or sets an action that been invoked when page index changed.

Property.name: PagerItemContainerTagName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the tag name of the container element that wraps every pager items, default value is null.

Property.name: PagerItemContainerCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the container element of pager items.

Property.name: NumericPagerItemContainerTagName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the tag name of the container element that wraps every numeric pager items, default value is null.

Property.name: NumericPagerItemContainerCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the container element of numeric pager items.

Property.name: CurrentPagerItemContainerTagName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the tag name of the container element that wraps current pager item, default value is null.

Property.name: CurrentPagerItemContainerCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the container element of the current pager item.

Property.name: NavigationPagerItemContainerTagName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the tag name of the container element that wraps first,last,next and previous pager items, default value is null.

Property.name: NavigationPagerItemContainerCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the container element of first,last,next and previous pager items.

Property.name: MorePagerItemContainerTagName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the tag name of the container element that wraps more pager items, default value is null.

Property.name: MorePagerItemContainerCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the container element of more pager items.

Property.name: DisabledPagerItemContainerTagName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the tag name of the container element that wraps disabled pager items, default value is null.
Property.remarks: When the current page index is 1, the first and the previous navigation pager items will be disabled; When the current page index is the last page index, then the next and the last navigation pager items will be disabled;

Property.name: DisabledPagerItemContainerCssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to the container element of the disabled pager item.

Property.name: RenderAfterBeginTag
Property.summary: Gets or sets the delegate that render the content after the begin tag of the pager component.

Property.name: RenderBeforeEndTag
Property.summary: Gets or sets the delegate that render the content before the end tag of the pager component.
